text: Cowboy from Brooklyn is a 1938 American musical comedy movie directed by Lloyd Bacon. It stars Pat O'Brien, Dick Powell, Priscilla Lane, Ann Sheridan, Dick Foran, Johnnie Davis, and Ronald Reagan. It was released on July 9, 1938. Category:1938 musical movies Category:1938 comedy movies Category:1930s American musical movies Category:American musical comedy movies Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Movies directed by Lloyd Bacon
title: Cowboy from Brooklyn
